attention3.ptxt: Before inspection, make sure that shift select lever is in “P” range, A/C is off and parking brake lever is pulled all the way up.

s1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
While listening to sound of injector (2) by using sound scope (1) or such, increase engine speed to higher than 3,000 r/min.
Check to make sure that injector operation sound is stop when throttle valve is closed instantly and it is heard again when engine speed is reduced to approx. 2,000 r/min or less.
